title: New Sony Gaming Lineup and Hyundai’s Ioniq 6
description:
Marques and Andrew start this week's episode off by talking about the newly announced Hyundai Ioniq 6 and compare it to other EV's on the market. After that, they give a live first impressions of the new Sony Inzone gaming products. Then they wrap it all up by clarifying the enhanced autopilot pricing that Tesla offers. Plus, there's some tough trivia this week! Let us know if you got any of them right! 

Links:
CNET Hyundai Ioniq 6: https://cnet.co/3NEqLWp
Hyundai Prophecy Concept car: https://bit.ly/3a3mdLC
Sony Inzone: https://bit.ly/sonyinzone
CNET Tesla Enhanced Autopilot: https://cnet.co/3IcDcb1
